bean.description: 根据模板id查找模板对应的运费配置

constructor-arg.value:
select
sfc.id as id, sfc.base_price as basePrice, sfc.dest_area_id as destAreaId, sfc.distribution_mode_id as distributionModeId, sfd.name as distributionModeName, sfc.first_part_price as firstPartPrice, sfc.first_part_unit as firstPartUnit, sfc.shipping_temeplate_id as shippingTemeplateId, sfc.subsequent_part_price as subsequentPartPrice, sfc.subsequent_part_unit as subsequentPartUnit
from T_SF_SHIPPING_CONFIG sfc , t_sf_distribution_mode sfd where sfc.distribution_mode_id = sfd.id and sfc.SHIPPING_TEMEPLATE_ID = :temeplateId

bean.description: 根据模板id删除模板对应的运费配置
根据模板ids批量删除模板对应的运费配置

constructor-arg.value: delete from T_SF_SHIPPING_CONFIG where SHIPPING_TEMEPLATE_ID in ( #foreach($tid in $temeplateIds ) $tid, #end -1)
